User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Block access to admin or sensitive areas (if any)
Disallow: /admin/
Disallow: /private/
Disallow: /*.json$
Disallow: /api/

# Allow all search engines to crawl important pages
Allow: /
Allow: /about-neet-2026
Allow: /contact
Allow: /privacy-policy
Allow: /terms-and-conditions

# Sitemap location
Sitemap: https://neetexamcountdown.com/sitemap.xml

# Crawl delay (optional - helps prevent server overload)
Crawl-delay: 1
